channel.title: Hard for me, probably easy for you
channel.description:
In my server, in the character files the password currently come up as a bunch of random numbers and letters being there not actual passwords.
Can someone please explain to me how to change that? :L
Thank you.

item.title: Hard for me, probably easy for you
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

You can also add an ingame coomand eg; ::getpass (username)

Read full topic
item.source: Hard for me, probably easy for you

item.title: Hard for me, probably easy for you
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Tbh believe it or not their are uses for being able to access encrypted passwords believe it or not (typically for lesser skilled programmers). I’m not saying his reasons for wanting to break the encryption are right or wrong; what I am saying is you shouldn’t hop on the bandwagon and question his question like morons.

Their are obviously uses for having a non encrypted password if you don’t have a way of using the account without changing the password.

Read full topic
item.source: Hard for me, probably easy for you

item.title: Hard for me, probably easy for you
item.dc:creator: @Brooklynn Brooklynn
item.description:
@Brooklynn wrote:

Probably best you keep them encrypted , like he said why do you wanna see the passwords anyway?

Read full topic
